name: ManyWho Box Service
description: A plugin that enables integration of Box into ManyWho Flows

SECURE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The path to the private key used by the box app in server to server requests

SECURE_PRIVATE_KEY_PASSWORD.description: The password used for the private key

OAUTH2_CONTENT_API_CLIENT_ID.description: The Client Id of the ManyWho Application in box

OAUTH2_CONTENT_API_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret of the ManyWho Application in box

OAUTH2_DEVELOPER_EDITION_CLIENT_ID.description: The Client Id of the ManyWho (server-to-server) Application in box

OAUTH2_DEVELOPER_EDITION_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret of the ManyWho (server-to-server) Application in box

ASSIGNMENT_FLOW_ID.description: Flow Id used when a webhook is created from box

ASSIGNMENT_FLOW_VERSION_ID.description: Flow Version Id used when a webhook is created from box

ASSIGNMENT_TENANT_ID.description: Tenant Id used when a webhook is created from box

REDIS_URL.description: Redis url to be used by this service

WEBHOOK_SIGNATURE_PRIMARY_KEY.description: Key used to check if the webhooks request really come from box

WEBHOOK_SIGNATURE_SECONDARY_KEY.description: Secondary Key used to check if the webhooks request really come from box
